body:
### About

I'm a neuroscientist wishing to know how the brain wires itself together. A better understanding of functional brain development is crucial for the prevention or treatment of many, if not all, neurological diseases, as well as realizing self-organization in complex robotic systems of the future.

I spend lots of time generating, exploring, and visualizing loads of data regarding the functional dynamics of electrical connections in the nervous system. To help accomplish this, I write lots of code in R and Matlab, with healthy doses of Python and the bash shell whenever I can.

### Science

[Google scholar](http://scholar.google.com/citations?user=qtmtHEUAAAAJ&hl=en)
